mapper.select: select count(*) from board where board_tag=#{tag}

select board_no, board_tag, board_title, board_content, read_count, (case when(trunc((sysdate - reg_date)*24*60)) < 60 then(trunc((sysdate - reg_date)*24*60))||'분전' when(trunc((sysdate - reg_date)*24)) < 24 then(trunc((sysdate - reg_date)*24))||'시간전' when trunc((sysdate - reg_date)) < 30 then trunc((sysdate - reg_date)) || '일전' when trunc((sysdate - reg_date) / 30) < 12 then trunc((sysdate - reg_date) / 30) || '개월전' else trunc((sysdate - reg_date) / 365) || '년전' end)as reg_date, member_nickname, member_profile from board join member using(member_nickname) where board_no=#{boardNo}
mapper.update: update board set read_count = read_count+1 where board_no = #{boardNo}
